net.consensys.cava.crypto.sodium

Class Sodium

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.consensys.cava.crypto.sodium.Sodium

  • public final class Sodium
extends java.lang.Object
    Access to the sodium native library.

    This class provides static methods for checking or loading the sodium native library.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean isAvailable()
      Check if the sodium library is available.
      static void loadLibrary(java.nio.file.Path path)
      Load and initialize the native libsodium shared library.
      static SodiumVersion minSupportedVersion()
      The minimum version of the sodium native library that this binding supports.
      static void searchLibrary(java.nio.file.Path... paths)
      Search for, then load and initialize the native libsodium shared library.
      static void searchLibrary(java.lang.String libraryName, java.nio.file.Path... paths)
      Search for, then load and initialize the native libsodium shared library.
      static boolean supportsVersion(SodiumVersion requiredVersion)
      Check if the loaded sodium native library is the same or later than the specified version.
      static SodiumVersion version()
      The version of the loaded sodium native library.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • minSupportedVersion

        public static SodiumVersion minSupportedVersion()
        The minimum version of the sodium native library that this binding supports.
        Returns:
        The minimum version of the sodium native library that this binding supports.

      • version

        public static SodiumVersion version()
        The version of the loaded sodium native library.
        Returns:
        The version of the loaded sodium library.

      • supportsVersion

        public static boolean supportsVersion(SodiumVersion requiredVersion)
        Check if the loaded sodium native library is the same or later than the specified version.
        Parameters:
        requiredVersion - The version to compare to.
        Returns:
        true if the loaded sodium native library is the same or a later version.

      • loadLibrary

        public static void loadLibrary(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Load and initialize the native libsodium shared library.

        If this method returns successfully (without throwing a LinkageError), then all future calls to methods provided by this class will use the loaded library.

        Parameters:
        path - The path to the shared library.
        Throws:
        java.lang.LinkageError - If the library cannot be found, dependent libraries are missing, or cannot be initialized.

      • searchLibrary

        public static void searchLibrary(java.nio.file.Path... paths)
        Search for, then load and initialize the native libsodium shared library.

        The library will be searched for in all the provided locations, using the library name "sodium". If this method returns successfully (without throwing a LinkageError), then all future calls to methods provided by this class will use the loaded library.

        Parameters:
        paths - A set of directories to search for the library in.
        Throws:
        java.lang.LinkageError - If the library cannot be found, dependent libraries are missing, or cannot be initialized.

      • searchLibrary

        public static void searchLibrary(java.lang.String libraryName,
                                 java.nio.file.Path... paths)
        Search for, then load and initialize the native libsodium shared library.

        The library will be searched for in all the provided locations, using the provided library name. If this method returns successfully (without throwing a LinkageError), then all future calls to methods provided by this class will use the loaded library.

        Parameters:
        libraryName - The name of the library (e.g. "sodium").
        paths - A set of directories to search for the library in.
        Throws:
        java.lang.LinkageError - If the library cannot be found, dependent libraries are missing, or cannot be initialized.

      • isAvailable

        public static boolean isAvailable()
        Check if the sodium library is available.

        If the sodium library has not already been loaded, this will attempt to load and initialize it before returning.

        Returns:
        true if the library is loaded and available.
